Guys,

You do a lot of Heritrix crawls, correct?  Do the default document wait 
times and maximum per-server bandwidth accurately reflect "best 
practices" in this area?  If so, you should know we've needed to reduce 
the per-server bandwidth to not annoy some sites...  If not, I'd love to 
hear what successful people are using for these parameters.

Karl Wright
